author: billbarker
msg: This allows the logfile rotation to be configured to be other than daily.

author: billbarker
msg: Thread-safety check that we actually have the Hook.
Under high load, it is possible for one thread to ask for a Hook before it has been created by another thread.  Since null is not a valid return value here, check for it first.
